Minister.Text: Minister of Natural Resources (for the purposes of s. 4) (SI/2023-34); Minister of Labour and the Minister of Employment and Social Development (for the purposes of s. 5) (SI/2024-35)

General.Text: Reports to be tabled in each House of Parliament, 2024, c. 13, s. 19

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 13 in force on assent 20.06.2024
